title: SpaceX Acquires xAI in $1.25 Trillion All-Stock Deal
full_text: SpaceX Acquires xAI in $1.25 Trillion All-Stock Deal. Elon Musk's SpaceX has acquired his AI startup xAI in an all-stock deal that values the combined entity at $1.25 trillion, ahead of what would be the largest initial public offering in history. SpaceX pegged its own valuation at $1 trillion -- a markup from t….
